SubSections.Title: Shoot Laser
SubSections.Content: You attack a combatant within range.

SubSections.Title: Static Discharge

Parts: After you hit a machinery attack against a combatant.

SubSections.Content: The combatant becomes paralyzed for 3 rounds.

SubSections.Title: Install Turret
SubSections.Content: You summon a turret at an empty point within range that activates after 1 round.

SubSections.Title: Overload
SubSections.Content: You attack all combatants within reach.

SubSections.Title: EMP Blast
SubSections.Content: You attack all combatants of your choice within range.

SubSections.Title: Personal Robot Assistant
SubSections.Content: You summon a robot assistant at an empty point within range. The robot assistant has learned all of your techniques, and fulfills all weapon requirements.

SubSections.Title: Snare
SubSections.Content: Choose a point within range and roll damage for a strike. You set a hidden trap on the chosen point that activates after 1 round. Before a combatant first (per round) moves into the trap, you strike the combatant (for the rolled damage). On a hit, the trap triggers and the combatant becomes grappled. If the grappled combatant moves out of the point, you strike it (for the rolled damage).

SubSections.Title: Wireless Recharge
SubSections.Content: Choose a point within range. All combatants of your choice become shielded while within 4 meters of the point.

SubSections.Title: Ultra High Voltage

Parts: After you hit a machinery attack against a combatant.

SubSections.Content: The combatant becomes paralyzed 2 for 1 round.

SubSections.Title: Mechanical Arms
SubSections.Content: You become strengthened for 3 rounds.

SubSections.Title: Mechanical Legs
SubSections.Content: You become hastened for 3 rounds.

SubSections.Title: Drone
SubSections.Content: Choose a loose or a willing combatant or an empty point within range. You summon the drone either on the chosen point or attach it to the combatant. While attached to a combatant, the drone's turn is during the combatant's turn, otherwise it is during your turn. While attached, the combatant's speed becomes 0 and it cannot use its move action, and whenever the drone uses its move action, the combatant also loses its move action. If the combatant has no move action left, the drone cannot use its either. You can use a free action to either unattach the drone or to attach the drone to a combatant close to it.

SubSections.Title: Self Destruction
SubSections.Content: Choose any number of controlled combatants within range that have been on the battlefield for at least 1 round. You attack all other combatants within 4 meters of any chosen combatant. All chosen combatants die.

SubSections.Title: Curse
SubSections.Content: You attack a combatant within range.

SubSections.Title: Seal Fate

Parts: After you hit an occultism attack against a combatant.

SubSections.Content: The combatant gains 3 doomed stacks.

SubSections.Title: Jinx

Parts: After you hit an occultism attack against a combatant.

SubSections.Content: Choose a target within range. For 1 round, the combatant's next attack against the target gains disadvantage against it.

SubSections.Title: Amplify Pain

Parts: After you hit an occultism attack against a combatant.

SubSections.Content: The combatant becomes vulnerable for 3 rounds.

SubSections.Title: Mental Breakdown

Parts: After you hit an occultism attack against a combatant.

SubSections.Content: The combatant becomes hopeless for 3 rounds.

SubSections.Title: Crucify

Parts: After you hit an occultism attack against a combatant.

SubSections.Content: The combatant becomes slowed and soulbound for 1 round.

SubSections.Title: Corrupt Mind

Parts: You hit a combatant within range below T10 health with an occultism attack.

SubSections.Content: For 1 round, it is unable to differentiate between combatants, and gains a strong desire to attack something. What this means exactly is up to the GM.

SubSections.Title: Vex

Parts: After you hit an occultism attack against a combatant.

SubSections.Content: The combatant becomes taunted against another combatant within range for 3 rounds.

SubSections.Title: Whispers Of Pain
SubSections.Content: Choose a combatant within range. At the start of your turns, you attack the combatant.

SubSections.Title: Innocent Lamb
SubSections.Content: Choose a combatant besides you within range. For 1 round, when the combatant is first killed by an attack, you attack the attacker.

SubSections.Title: Unholy Domain
SubSections.Content: Choose a point within range. Whenever a combatant ends its turn within 6 meters of the point, it gains 3 doomed stacks.

SubSections.Title: Hexguard
SubSections.Content: Choose a willing combatant within range. For 2 rounds, the combatant gains psychic and unholy resistance.

SubSections.Title: Multicurse
SubSections.Content: You attack up to 3 combatants within a [Range] meters cone.

SubSections.Title: Shared Torment
SubSections.Content: Choose 2 willing combatants within range. Whenever one of them takes damage (before shield), both take [original damage -/ 2] damage instead.

SubSections.Title: Telepathic Strike
SubSections.Content: You attack a combatant within range.

SubSections.Title: Telekinetic Grasp

Parts: After you hit a psionics attack against a combatant.

SubSections.Content: The combatant becomes grappled.

SubSections.Title: Telekinetic Strike
SubSections.Content: You attack a combatant within range.

SubSections.Title: Bend Space

Parts: After you hit a psionics attack against a combatant.

SubSections.Content: The combatant becomes soulbound for 3 rounds.

SubSections.Title: Mental Fortress
SubSections.Content: For 3 rounds, you gain hopeless immunity and psychic resistance.

SubSections.Title: Psychic Blast
SubSections.Content: You attack all combatants within a [Range] meters cone.

SubSections.Title: Hypnotic Gaze

Parts: After you hit a psionics attack against a combatant.

SubSections.Content: The combatant becomes collapsed for 3 rounds.

SubSections.Title: Erase Presence
SubSections.Content: You become hidden until you use an action.

SubSections.Title: Telekinetic Push

Parts: After you hit a psionics attack against a combatant.

SubSections.Content: You push the combatant up to 4 meters into a direction of your choice.

SubSections.Title: Mind Fortress
SubSections.Content: You gain hopeless immunity and psychic resistance for 3 rounds.

SubSections.Title: Clear Mind
SubSections.Content: You lose the hopeless and taunted conditions.

SubSections.Title: Psychic Field
SubSections.Content: Choose a point within range. At the start of your turns, you attack all combatants within 6 meters of the point.

SubSections.Title: Psychic Terror
SubSections.Content: Choose a combatant within range. At the start of your turns, you attack the combatant.

SubSections.Title: Split Mind
SubSections.Content: Choose a combatant within range. After 2 rounds, you attack it.

SubSections.Title: Reap
SubSections.Content: You attack a combatant within range.

SubSections.Title: Extract Soul

Parts: After you hit a soul attack against a combatant.

SubSections.Content: The combatant gains 1 rotting stack.

SubSections.Title: Arise
SubSections.Content: You summon a undead at an empty point within range.

SubSections.Title: Injure Soul

Parts: After you hit a souls attack against a combatant.

SubSections.Content: The combatant becomes scarred for 3 rounds.

SubSections.Title: Sever Soul

Parts: After you hit a souls attack against a combatant.

SubSections.Content: The combatant becomes collapsed for 3 rounds.

SubSections.Title: Drain Life

Parts: After you hit a souls attack against a combatant.

SubSections.Content: You gain T4 shield.

SubSections.Title: Disperse Life

Parts: After you hit a souls attack against a combatant.

SubSections.Content: All combatants of your choice within 8 meters of the combatant gain T1 shield.

SubSections.Title: Soul Binding

Parts: After you hit a souls attack against a combatant.

SubSections.Content: The combatant becomes soulbound for 3 rounds.

SubSections.Title: Graveyard
SubSections.Content: Choose a point within range. At the start of your turns, you summon an undead on an empty point within 8 meters of the chosen point.

SubSections.Title: Grand Resurrection
SubSections.Content: After 2 rounds, you summon an undead at an empty point within range.

SubSections.Title: Lingering Rot
SubSections.Content: Choose a point within range. Whenever a combatant ends its turn within 6 meters of the point, it gains 1 rotting stacks.

SubSections.Title: Hasten Rot

Parts: After you hit a soul attack against a combatant with rotting stacks.

SubSections.Content: The severity of its rotting condition is increased to 2.

SubSections.Title: Soul Ward
SubSections.Content: Choose a point within range. All combatants of your choice gain soulbound and rotting immunity while within 4 meters of the point.

SubSections.Title: Mass Extraction
SubSections.Content: You attack all combatants within a [Range] meters cone.

SubSections.Title: Extinction
SubSections.Content: After 3 rounds, you attack all combatants of your choice within range.

SubSections.Title: Heart Demon
SubSections.Content: You attack a combatant within range.

SubSections.Title: Ethereal Grasp

Parts: After you hit a spirits attack against a combatant.

SubSections.Content: The combatant becomes grappled.

SubSections.Title: Weapon Spirit
SubSections.Content: Choose 1 or 2 weapon types that you have equipped. You summon a weapon spirit at an empty point within range. The weapon spirit can use all of your techniques that use exactly the same weapon types as the ones you chose. Unequipping a chosen weapon type interrupts this ability.

SubSections.Title: Cripple Spirit

Parts: After you hit a spirits attack against a combatant.

SubSections.Content: The combatant becomes scarred for 3 rounds.

SubSections.Title: Totem
SubSections.Content: You summon a totem on an empty point within range.

SubSections.Title: Custom Totem
SubSections.Content: You summon a custom totem on an empty point within range. Choose a basic technique that you have learned. At the start of your turns, you use the technique from the totem's location.

SubSections.Title: Misty Step
SubSections.Content: You teleport to an empty point within range. Either before or after teleporting, you attack all combatants within reach.

SubSections.Title: Flash Step (Example Mutation)
SubSections.Content: You teleport to an empty point within range. Either before or after teleporting, you attack all combatants within reach.

SubSections.Title: Horrific Cry
SubSections.Content: You attack all combatants of your choice within range.

SubSections.Title: Break Spirit

Parts: After you hit a spirits attack against a combatant.

SubSections.Content: The combatant becomes hopeless for 3 rounds.

SubSections.Title: Calm Spirit

Parts: After you hit a spirits attack against a combatant.

SubSections.Content: The combatant becomes pacified for 3 rounds.

SubSections.Title: Anger Spirit

Parts: After you hit a spirits attack against a combatant.

SubSections.Content: The combatant becomes taunted against another combatant within range for 3 rounds.

SubSections.Title: Guardian Angel
SubSections.Content: You become protected 2 against the attack.

SubSections.Title: Phantom Ward
SubSections.Content: You become sanctified for 3 rounds.

SubSections.Title: Words Of Truth
SubSections.Content: You attack a combatant within range.

Parts: After you hit a words attack against a combatant.
The combatant becomes taunted against you for 3 rounds

SubSections.Title: Burn

Parts: After you hit a words attack against a combatant.

SubSections.Content: The combatant becomes aflame for 3 rounds.

SubSections.Title: Mock

Parts: After you hit a words attack against a combatant.

SubSections.Content: The combatant becomes hopeless for 3 rounds.

SubSections.Title: Suggest

Parts: Before you make a words attack against a combatant.

SubSections.Content: On a hit, make a suggestion. If it is physically unable to fulfill your suggestion or doing so would seem illogical from its perspective, this ability ends. If it ignores your suggestion, you attack it and this ability ends. What this means exactly is up to the GM.

SubSections.Title: Inspire
SubSections.Content: A willing combatant within range becomes zealous for 2 rounds.

SubSections.Title: Fuel Fire
SubSections.Content: A willing combatant within range becomes strengthened for 2 rounds.

SubSections.Title: Spoil Dangers
SubSections.Content: A willing combatant within range becomes shielded for 2 rounds.

SubSections.Title: Deny Reality

Parts: After a combatant within range is hit.

SubSections.Content: The combatant becomes protected against the attack.

SubSections.Title: Talk Down

Parts: After you hit a words attack against a combatant.

SubSections.Content: The combatant becomes weakened for 3 rounds.

SubSections.Title: Reveal Secrets

Parts: After you hit a words attack against a combatant.

SubSections.Content: The combatant becomes revealed for 3 rounds.

SubSections.Title: Group Insult
SubSections.Content: Choose a point within range. You attack all combatants within 4 meters of the point.

SubSections.Title: Awaken Childhood Trauma
SubSections.Content: Choose a combatant within range. At the start of your turns, you attack the combatant.
